rooms.description: A combined living area with integrated kitchen design featuring large windows for natural light and ventilation. The room is oriented to face the garden on the south side to promote positive energy flow according to Vastu principles.
Adjacent to the living area, providing a space for dining that overlooks the garden. The open plan encourages family interactions while maintaining a sense of spaciousness.
A small bathroom designed for guests, ensuring privacy and convenience.
A dedicated space for laundry, storage, and additional utilities. This room is placed conveniently near the kitchen.

openings.description: Provides access to the garden and ensures ample natural ventilation.
